game.name: PICO PARK
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PICO PARK is a cooperative local/online multiplay action puzzle game for 2-8 players.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PICO PARK is a cooperative local/online multiplay action puzzle game for 2-8 players.

reviewHighlights.text: Made me realize that the average IQ of my friends was WAY lower than I assumed. In all seriousness the game is a ton of fun.
This game is an absolute blast with multiple people! Admittedly, it gets more difficult with more people, but that just adds to the multiplayer carnag...
